content:
I'm glad you asked! I think sustainable fashion is a great trend, and I've been trying to be more mindful of my shopping habits lately. I've been buying from websites that offer eco-friendly options, and I've also been considering shopping during sales or using coupons to reduce waste.

I'm not sure about the neon colors, though - I'm more of a neutral tones kind of person. But I do like the idea of statement sleeves - they can really add some flair to an outfit!

As for must-haves, I completely agree on the sunglasses and comfy sandals. I've been wearing my sunglasses nonstop since the weather started getting warmer, and I just bought a new pair of sandals that are so comfortable.

I've also been looking into getting a breathable hat, but I haven't found one that I like yet. Do you have any recommendations for good hat brands or styles?

And sunscreen is a must, of course! I always make sure to apply it before going outside, especially
